name: Hide The Pickle
description:
4 years ago to the day, Find The Pussy was created as a game based on maths/game theory.  Realising after all this time that the game must be followed up, Hide The Pickle was born.

Hide The Pickle is a sequel and a double reversal title of the original game. Instead of finding.... you're hiding and instead of a pussy there's now a pickle.

Starting with 7 boxes in the first round,  you will try to survive the thrilling excitement of selecting a numbered box where you will place your pickle inside. *sarcasm*

In each round, the C64 attempts the guess which box the pickle is in by random. If the computer fails, a box is removed and play will continue culminating in a final round where you face off with the C64 where you have a 50:50 shot of winning!  

If you were just as a good as finding a pussy, then you should be just as good at hiding a pickle too. Download and play the game to find out.
